reviews.text: On tap @ Cafe Georgette, Brussels. Pours cloudy honey with small cream head. Nose is sour. Taste is sour chalky, finish is abrupt. I love the cleanliness of this beer, like water distilled through layers of sandstone. Brilliant.

I would rather take the fat from a good beer, than take the zero flavour crap that this beer is.  CUB never cease to amaze me the further i dive into their vast array of beers the more they disgust me.  cheers
A very good irish red ale. Lovely malt aromas and taste. Cloudy red appearance that delivers a very enjoyable beer.
